attributes.additional_details: This school has been going for many many years and hopefully will be going for many more. The teaching at this school is outstanding, the children are like an extended family they are so close. They all help each other. The village would lose its heart if they lost the school, we only have a church, a hall and the school and if anyone of them was to go it would break the chain between them.
attributes.background: This school has been going through a consultation to close the school on educational grounds, even tho they have a "GOOD" ofsted report.We want to keep the school open as the children are doing so well at all different levels of learning.The village and the community needs and wants this school here

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The closure of this school is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: 

https://www.devon.gov.uk/petitions.htm
